pinyin: lài há má xiǎng chī tiān é ròu
meaning: A toad wanting to eat swan meat (Craving something out of one「s league)
description: Literally "a toad wants to eat swan meat". Describes someone who has unrealistic or impossible dreams, or expresses desires that are far beyond their reach.

examples.chinese: 你这癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉啊
examples.translation: You「re dreaming of the impossible (like a toad wanting swan meat)

examples.chinese: 穷逼男,不要癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉了
examples.translation: You broke guy, don't dream of things out of your league

examples.chinese: 我知道我自己是癞蛤蟆,但是我就想吃一口大毛这样的天鹅肉
examples.translation: I know I'm a toad, but I just want a bite of swan meat like Big Mao
